cards.title: Research: AI promo video stack (best quality vs cost) + recommend workflow
cards.description: Research AI tools for high-quality promo video: video gen, editing, voice, music. Produce a recommended stack (lean/premium) with UK pricing and an initial 30s script + shot list. Update docs/PROMO_VIDEO_AI.md with citations/links.

cards.title: UK partner/competitor scan: kits + lights + env controllers (mushrooms/microgreens)
cards.description: Research UK offerings: mushroom kits/blocks; microgreens kits; grow lighting; humidity/CO2/FAE controllers; suppliers. Summarise into docs/PARTNERS.md with a shortlist and “reference kits” recommendations.

cards.title: UK startup setup research + Grow Cabin name checks
cards.description: Research: sole trader vs Ltd; Companies House steps/costs; UKIPO trademark checks for “Grow Cabin”; banking/accounting; insurance; compliance; estimate setup costs. Update docs/STARTUP_SETUP_UK.md with citations + recommendations.

cards.title: Incorporate James BOM + supplier research into Costs/Suppliers
cards.description: Review inbound-james-2026-02-10 environmental-control-bom + budget-grow-sheds; merge useful line items/suppliers into COSTS_MOCKUP.csv and stakeholder supplier list.

cards.title: Create/maintain Snippets doc (verbatim-ish key chat chunks)
cards.description: Keep notes/projects/grow-cabin/SNIPPETS.md updated with important excerpts, linked to message IDs where possible.

cards.title: Segmentation first: pick initial segment (foodie vs functional vs DIY vs families)
cards.description: From prior GPT chat: test positioning before building. Create 3 positioning mini-cards and show to 10 humans. See notes/projects/grow-cabin/GPT-PRIOR-CHAT-2026-02-10.md

cards.title: Week-1 positioning mini-cards + interview script
cards.description: Draft Card A Foodie / Card B Functional / Card C DIY kits; create a simple interview script and scoring rubric.

cards.title: Maintain conversation log + roadmap docs
cards.description: Keep LOG-CHAT-SUMMARY.md + ROADMAP.md updated as decisions/ideas land.

cards.title: Document: route to first investor (flowchart + artifacts)
cards.description: Maintain investor-route flow + required proof package. Source: notes/projects/grow-cabin/INVESTOR_ROUTE.md

cards.title: Define v0 target: mushroom species
cards.description: Pick first species to optimise for (e.g., oyster vs lion’s mane vs shiitake). Drives temperature, RH, fresh-air exchange, and recipe design.

cards.title: Define v0 target: greens format
cards.description: Decide microgreens trays vs baby-leaf, tray size, and whether soil/coco/hydro. Drives irrigation and lighting needs.

cards.title: Decide product architecture: one chamber vs two variants
cards.description: Single chamber supports both via recipes vs two variants / swappable inserts. Capture rationale in decision map.

cards.title: Choose isolation tier (CEA control level)
cards.description: Tier 1 stabilised enclosure vs Tier 2 managed intake/exhaust vs Tier 3 near-sealed. Home market likely Tier 1–2.

cards.title: Set target price band for v0
cards.description: Pick rough band (£100 / £500 / £1500). Constrains BOM, complexity, and what ‘autopilot’ means.

cards.title: Define MVP sensor/actuator stack (non-vendor)
cards.description: Minimum viable: temp+RH, door sensor; actuators: fan (FAE), humidifier; add lights + watering for greens; optional CO₂.

cards.title: Design the recipe data model (stages + ranges + schedules)
cards.description: Recipe = stages (incubation/fruiting etc) with setpoint ranges, schedules, safety limits, and versioning; manual stage switch at first.

cards.title: Prototype 0: logging + dashboard
cards.description: Instrument sensors and log time series + actuator states + user events. Goal: learn dynamics and failure modes before full automation.

cards.title: Prototype 1: humidity control loop
cards.description: Implement simple hysteresis (then PID if needed) for RH. Add safeguards against over-wetting and condensation.

cards.title: Prototype 1: fresh-air exchange (FAE) scheduling
cards.description: Fan cycles to manage CO₂/morphology while avoiding drying. Consider adding optional CO₂ sensor later.

cards.title: Greens: lighting schedule + dimming strategy
cards.description: Define photoperiod and intensity control approach; decide if light sensor is needed in v0.

cards.title: Greens: watering approach
cards.description: Decide bottom watering vs misting vs drip; add root-zone moisture sensing if needed; manage damping-off risk.

cards.title: Define contamination / cleanability principles
cards.description: Mushrooms need contamination control; define how users clean, replace filters, manage standing water, and handle fruiting blocks.

cards.title: Brand: choose canonical name form (Grow Cabin vs GrowCabin)
cards.description: Decide two-words vs one-word for packaging/handles; draft tagline and visual direction.

cards.title: Write the one-page project brief
cards.description: Distill: who it’s for, problem, value proposition, MVP, constraints, and next milestone.

cards.title: Research pack: 10–20 high-quality CEA sources
cards.description: Standards + FAO/universities + review papers + practical vendor docs; attach to taxonomy/case studies with citations.

cards.title: Created Grow Cabin project file with decision trees
cards.description: See notes/projects/grow-cabin/PROJECT.md

cards.title: Drafted smart farming taxonomy + glossary + case-study scaffold
cards.description: See notes/smart-farming/TAXONOMY.md, GLOSSARY.md, CASE-STUDIES.md

cards.title: Spun up Grow Cabin project board
cards.description: Board files in agent-dashboard-web/store/grow-cabin-board/ (Kanban + Decisions + Brain + Rules)
